T07TD4094.2E:64a-9: khyim bdag gi bu de dag gi nye bar brjod pa nyan snyam sems sam /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-11: khyim bdag gi bu mi'i chos las bla mar gyur pa'i kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul la nyes dmigs 'di lta bu ngas yang dag par rjes su gzigs nas /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-12: dge slong dag dge ba ni gsang bar bya zhing sdig pa ni mthol bar bya'o zhes nyan thos rnams la chos ston par mdzad do //
T07TD4094.2E:64a-13: khyim bdag gi bu rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gang zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-14: khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes bya ba nas rgyas par gnas rnam pa gsum rnams la ston pa'i yongs su dag pa btsal bar bya'o zhes de'i dpe tshul khrims kyi phung po'i bsam gtan dang /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-15: mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po'i mdo lnga ba'i stod kyi cha las 'byung la /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-16: smad kyi cha ni mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par tshangs pa'i bar du g-yo sgyu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba der bris zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:64a-18: yid mgyogs 'gro ba zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-19: bcom ldan 'das shar sha pa'i grong khyer gyi tsan dan gyi khang pa na bzhugs te /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-20: de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-21: goo ta ma zhes bya ba gnyis gnas te /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-22: bcom ldan 'das shar sha pa'i grong khyer na chos ston gyis nyan pa'i phyir 'gro'o zhes gnas te /
T07TD4094.2E:64a-23: de nas klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-0: chu bo lnga brgya nas byung ste shar sha pa'i grong khyer du 'ong ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @64b kyi chos rnams la mi brjed pa'i dran pas klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-1: goo ta ma gnyis shar sha ba'i grong khyer du 'ongs na grong khyer gzhig cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba gzigs te /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po la bos te /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-3: mood gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i glo bur ba'i bsod snyoms dag zung shig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-4: mood gal gyi bu chen po glo bur gyi bsod snyoms ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-6: glo bur du lhags pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-11: 'don 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid las byed pa yin no //
T07TD4094.2E:64b-13: mood gal gyi bu thabs cig tu klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-14: goo ta ma gnyis gang na ba der gshegs shing nye bar gshegs te bka' stsal pa /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-15: klu'i dbang po dag shur pa ri'i grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsam par gyis shig / de gnyis kyis smras pa /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-16: btsun pa dad pa'i shugs de 'dra bas bdag cag der 'ongs na gang yang bdag srog chags grog sbur yan chad la yang gnod par mi nus na /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-17: shur sha pa na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol bar rtsom pa na /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-19: klu de dag so so nas 'di snyam du kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chu gsol bar gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems so //
T07TD4094.2E:64b-21: gal te gcig gi chu 'thungs na gzhan dag mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o zhes dgongs te /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po la bos te /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-23: mood gal gyi bu chu lnga brgya gang du 'dus pa de las chu lhung bzed gang khyer la shog shig / btsun pa de bzhin no zhes tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-24: chu bo lnga brgya gang du 'dus pa de las chu lhung bzed gang blangs te /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-25: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-26: nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la chu lhung bzed bkang nas phul ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:64b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis blangs te gsol to //
T07TD4094.2E:65a-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mood gal @65a * //
T07TD4094.2E:65a-1: gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-2: sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag pha dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-3: ma dag ni bu la dka' ba byed pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-4: gsos skyed par byed cing 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-6: phrag pa gnyis pa la ma khyer te /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-7: lo 'khor ba brgyar gnas pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-8: gang yang sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-18: lo he ta r'a ga dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-19: dung g-yas su 'khyil pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu rnams kyis phyug par byas kyang bus pha dang ma la phan pa byas pa ma yin no //
T07TD4094.2E:65a-20: gang gis pha dang ma ma dad pa dad pa phun sum tshogs par byed cing 'dul ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-22: rab tu 'jog par byed cing tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-23: ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-24: shes rab 'chal ba shes rab phun sum tshogs par byed cing 'dul ba la rab tu 'god pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-26: 'di tsam gyis bus pha dang ma la phan ba byas pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:65a-27: bdag gis ma la phan pa cung zad kyang ma byas kyis da bdag gis ma gang du skyes pa bsam par bya'o zhes des bsams pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong zhing /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar mthong nas /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-30: de 'di snyam du bdag thag ring po nas 'ongs par gyur la bdag gis don 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs par bya'o zhes /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-31: des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T07TD4094.2E:65a-32: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pha dang ma bu la dka' ba byed pa ste zhes gsungs na /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-33: bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis gdul bar 'os te /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-34: bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste de gdul bar mdzad du gsol /
T07TD4094.2E:65a-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-0: mood gal gyi bu gang gi rdzu 'phrul @65b gyis 'gro bar bya /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi steng du zhabs 'jog cing gshegs te /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-3: zhag bdun gyis 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin to //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-4: mood gal gyi du [*bu?] chen po thag ring po nas 'ong ba bu mo bzang mos mthong ste /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-5: mthong nas rings par de'i drung du 'ongs te smras pa /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-6: yun ring mo zhig na bu mthong ngo yun ring mo zhig na bu mthong ngo zhes smras so //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-7: de na skye bo mang bo'i tshogs dag 'di skad du gzhon nu ma 'di rab tu byung ba rgan po 'di'i mar ji ltar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-8: de dag la 'phags pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos bdag gi phung po 'di gsos shing bskyed pa des na 'di ma zhes bya'o zhes smras so //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu ma bzang mo'i bsam pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-10: bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen par mdzad nas /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-11: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mthong ba de lta bu'i chos bstan par mdzad de /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-12: gzhon nu ma bzang mos thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mtho ba nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
T07TD4094.2E:65b-13: de bden pa mthong nas ched du brjod pa lan gsum du ched du brjod pa snga ma bzhin du lha dang mi la bkod do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-15: shin tu rkyen mang ldan pa'i ngan song ngam //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-16: 'jigs su rung las khyed kyi mthu yis bsgral //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-17: mtho ris 'gro ba'i bsod nams sgo phye zhing //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-18: mya ngan 'das pa'i lam ni bdag gis thob //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-19: khyod la brten nas bdag skyon rnam dag cing //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-20: bdag gi mig ni shin tu rnam dag gyur //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-21: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin gyur cing //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-22: 'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i gnas thob bo //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-23: skye rga 'chi ba'i 'khrug dang bral gyur cing //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-24: lha dang lha min mi yi 'gro bas mchod //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-25: skye ba stong du mthong ba rnyed dka' ba //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-26: thub pa mthong ba 'bras bu bcas par gyur //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-27: btsun pa bdag ni mngon par 'phags so //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-29: ded nas bzung ste bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
T07TD4094.2E:65b-30: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-0: @66a * // dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngo zhing skyabs su 'gro zhing mngon par dang ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:66a-1: bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig tu bsod snyoms bzhes par gnang bar mdzod cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-2: gzhon nu ma bzang mos bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po bde bar bzhugs par rig nas /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-3: gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis rang gi lag nas 'drim par byed /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-6: bza' ba dang bca' pa dag gis brims shing bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gsol bar rig nas lag pa gnyis kyis lhung bzed gyu ste /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-7: stan dma' ba cig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyur to //
T07TD4094.2E:66a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan te /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-9: tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed blangs nas bkrus te /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-11: mood gal gyi bu 'gro bar bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:66a-12: bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig / gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-14: gang yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa de lta bu'i dgongs pa mdzad de /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-16: mood gal gyi bu phyin to //
T07TD4094.2E:66a-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-18: bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-19: mood gal gyi bu yid mgyogs pa'o //
T07TD4094.2E:66a-20: btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di ltar zab pa bdag gis rnam par mi shes te /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-21: gal te rnam par shes par ma gyur na yang bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma tsam du gyur kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bzlog par mi bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:66a-22: da bdag gis ci bya ste bud shing tshig ba bzhin du gyur to zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:66a-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:66a-24: bzhi las 'phros pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa 'di nyid du sems can gyi gnas dgu'i skabs su bris shing /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-0: mdzod kyi gnas gsum par @66b srid pa bar ma bsam par sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes yang dag par bshad do //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-1: ston min sprul pa po dang bcas //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-3: phran tshegs kyi sde snod las don gyi sde tshan bcu pa las mdo 'di ltar 'don te /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-4: de nas mnyan yod na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag 'di snyam du rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis rab tu byung ba rnams dang rab tu byung ba rnams su rtsod cing 'thab pa dang mtshang 'bru ba dang chad pas gcod pa dag byung bar gyur /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-5: bcom ldan 'das la gus pas 'dri ba'i nus pa med do snyam mo //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gi sems thugs kyis mngon par mkhyen nas /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-7: mgo bregs shing chos gos bgos pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sprul pa zhig sprul par mdzad do ;
T07TD4094.2E:66b-8: ; chos nyid kyis nyan thos rnams kyis sprul pa sprul nas /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-9: nyan thos rnams smra na sprul pa yang smra bar byed la /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-10: nyan thos rnams mi smra na sprul pa yang mi smra bar 'gyur zhing /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-13: gcig mi smra na thams cad kyang mi smra bar 'gyur ro ;
T07TD4094.2E:66b-14: / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sprul pa sprul par mdzad pa na /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri bar mdzad pa na sprul pa lung ston par byed la /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-16: sprul pa dri bar mdzad na bcom ldan 'das lung ston par mdzad do //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-17: de nas sprul pa de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar zhing phyag byas nas /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-18: de'i tshe don gyi sde tshan 'di las brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
T07TD4094.2E:66b-19: phrag dog lhan cig mya ngan smre sngags 'don //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-20: 'thab rtsod 'di dag gang gis rab tu bskyed //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-21: phra ma dang bcas nga rgyal lhag nga rgyal //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-22: 'di dag gang gis bskyed pa bdag 'dri'o //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-23: phrag dog lhan cig mya ngan smre sngags 'don //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-24: 'thab dang rtsod pa 'di dag dga' bas bskyed //
T07TD4094.2E:66b-25: phra ma dang bcas nga rgyal lhag nga rgyal //
T07TD4094.2E:67a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa byung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:67a-3: gcig cig smra bar gyur ba na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dpe ni lung ring po'i mdo las tshangs pa'i sprul pa de dag lha'i dbang po'i phang par 'dug ste so so nas gtam smras so zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-5: // /'phags pa 'od srungs chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-6: gang gi phyir de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa gtad de /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-7: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gsung rab bsdu ba byas so //
T07TD4094.2E:67a-8: dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-9: 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po la bstan pa yongs su gtad do //
T07TD4094.2E:67a-10: de ltar bya ba ma lus par byas te /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-11: ri bya rkang mo'i steng du 'dzegs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i na bzas lus dang bsil byed dang lhung bzed gtums te ;
T07TD4094.2E:67a-13: bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i gsung rab kyi bar du nyams par ma gyur cing des rang gi 'khor rnams la rig par byed par 'gyur ro zhes byin gyis brlabs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
T07TD4094.2E:67a-14: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byams pa 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang lhan cig sa phyogs der gshegs te ri gsum po dag rnam par bsal te /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-15: bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i phyag gis rus pa'i tshogs bsnams te chos ston par 'gyur te /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-16: chos ston ba thos nas nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes phren tshegs las /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-17: dbyangs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sman gyi gzhi'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa las rgyas par 'don to //
T07TD4094.2E:67a-18: chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam par bshad pa nye bar mkho ba zhes bya ba las mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa phal cher mdo dang sbyar ba rdzogs so /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-20: // /'di ltar mdo las lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa dang zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-21: lam gyi tshogs kyi bslab pa'i sgo'i mdo gsum pa dang bzhi pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa 'di nyid du /
T07TD4094.2E:67a-22: de'i tshe de mi slob dgra bcom //
T07TD4094.2E:67b-3: shes rab kyi rang bzhin yin zhes bris zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:67b-4: sems yongs su dag pa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:67b-5: stag gi byang chub kyi bu dang /
T07TD4094.2E:67b-6: nyan thos kyi rnam par bshad pa sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gcig pa'i tha ma las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas drug par bshad zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:67b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan mi dge ba dag kyang zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:67b-8: tshangs pa'i tshogs kyi sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i mood gal gyi bu dang sbas pa'i mdo las 'di ltar 'don te /
T07TD4094.2E:67b-9: de'i tshe na sde dpon nye dga' 'khor der 'dus par gyur cing tshogs te 'dug par gyur te /
T07TD4094.2E:67b-10: de nas sde dpon nye dgas chen por grags pa'i bram ze 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so //
T07TD4094.2E:67b-11: 'char byed khyed cag 'ong ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na de ltar bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi tshul gyis mngon par dga' ba bden nam /
T07TD4094.2E:67b-12: sde dpon de de bzhin te /
T07TD4094.2E:67b-14: bsam gtan dang bsam gtan gyi tshul gyis sdom par byed do //
T07TD4094.2E:67b-15: dus gcig gi tshe bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma chu bo can byi kun dze ka'i spyil bu na bzhugs te /
T07TD4094.2E:67b-16: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma des bdag la bsam gtan thams cad ni bsngags shing bsam gtan thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags pa gsung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:67b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chen por grags pa'i bram ze 'char byed la 'di skad ces smras so //
T07TD4094.2E:67b-18: 'char byed khyod 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma des bdag la bsam gtan thams cad bsngags shing bsam gtan thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa gsung ngo zhes ma smra shig /'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ni bsngags par mi 'os pa de dag gi bsngags pa mi gsung gi / bsngags par 'os pa dag gi bsngags pa mi gsung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:67b-19: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das goo ta ma gang bsngags par mi 'os pa dag gi bsngags pa mi gsung zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-0: 'char byed 'di na kha cig 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems la lan mang du gnas shing 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i @68a * //
T07TD4094.2E:68a-1: skyes pa rnams la phyis nges pa 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes te /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-2: de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pas bar du bcad cing sgom par byed rab tu bsgom zhing bsgom ste /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-7: the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pas sems la lan mang du gnas shing the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pa skyes pa rnams las /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-8: phyis nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes te /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-9: de the tshom gyis kun nas dkris pas rab tu bcad cing sgom par byed /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-10: rab tu bsgom zhing bsgom ste /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-11: 'di ltar na bsngags par ma 'os pa'i bsam gtan gyi bsngags pa mi gsung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:68a-12: ji ltar na bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa gsung zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-13: 'char byed 'di na dge slong 'dod pa las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba las dben zhes bya ba nas ;
T07TD4094.2E:68a-14: bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-15: 'di ltar na bsngags par 'os pa bsngags so //
T07TD4094.2E:68a-16: kun dga' po bcom ldan 'das goo ta mas bsngags par mi 'os pa'i bsam gtan gyi bsngags pa mi gsung zhing /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-17: bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa gsung ngam /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-18: kun dga' bo bdag la yang bya ba mang po dang bya ba mang du mchis kyis 'gro bar bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:68a-19: 'char byed de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig / de nas chen por grags pa'i ma ga dh'a'i bram ze 'char byed tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bshad pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ste /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-20: stan las langs te song ngo zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:68a-21: gal te tshe dang drod gnyis 'dres par gsungs pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-22: lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'i mthar gsus po che'i mdo las byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-23: de las byung ba'i tshor ba drug / lnga ni lus kyi'o sems kyi gzhan //
T07TD4094.2E:68a-24: zhes bya bar tshe dang drod gnyis lhan cig cing 'dres par gsungs pa'i phyir skad cig ma nges par grub po zhes bya bar bris zin to /
T07TD4094.2E:68a-26: // /'dam bu'i shog gnyis bzhin zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-0: gleng gzhi @68b ni rgyal po'i khab na'o //
T07TD4094.2E:68b-1: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-2: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che gnyis rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod phung po'i ri la brten te gnas to //
T07TD4094.2E:68b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-4: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che gang na ba der nye bar song ste /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-5: nye bar song nas tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' ba ngang yang dag par bde ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
T07TD4094.2E:68b-6: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che la 'di skad ces smras so //
T07TD4094.2E:68b-7: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs su 'byed na bdag phyogs cung zad cig yongs su 'dri'o //
T07TD4094.2E:68b-8: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dris shig dang thos nas rig par bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:68b-9: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che rga ba yod dam /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-10: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu yod do ;
T07TD4094.2E:68b-12: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu yod do //
T07TD4094.2E:68b-13: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ci rga ba dang 'chi ba dag rang gis byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-15: 'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-16: 'on te rga ba dang 'chi ba dag rang gis kyang ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med par byung /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-17: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rga ba dang 'chi ba ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis ma byas la /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-18: rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-19: rga ba dang 'chi ba dag ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las kyang ma byung gi /'on kyang skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga ba dang 'chi ba byung ngo /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-20: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ci skye ba rang gis byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-22: 'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:68b-23: skye ba dang rga ba dag rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /

T07TD4094.2E:69a-13: 'on te len pa rang gis kyang ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /

T07TD4094.2E:69a-22: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sred pa ni rang gis kyang ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la /
T07TD4094.2E:69a-23: rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4094.2E:69a-24: sred pa rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te /
T07TD4094.2E:69a-25: 'on kyang tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa byung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:69a-26: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che tshor ba rang gis byas sam //
T07TD4094.2E:69a-28: 'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:69a-29: 'on te tshor ba rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /
T07TD4094.2E:69a-30: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshor ba ni rang gis kyang ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la /
T07TD4094.2E:69a-31: rang gis byas pa yang ma yin gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-0: tshor ba rang gis ma byas @69b gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-1: 'on kyang rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba byung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:69b-2: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che reg pa rang gis byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-4: 'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-5: 'on te reg pa dang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-6: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu reg pa ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis ma byas la /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-7: rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-8: reg pa rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-9: 'on kyang skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa byung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:69b-10: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che skye mched drug rang gis byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-12: 'on te rang gis kyang byas shing /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-14: 'on te skye mched drug rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-15: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu skye mched drug ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-16: rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis ma byas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-17: skye mched drug ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-18: 'on kyang ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug byung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:69b-19: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ming dang gzugs rang gis byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-21: 'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-22: ming dang gzugs rang gis ma byas /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-23: gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-24: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ming dang gzugs ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-25: rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-26: ming dang gzugs ni rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-27: 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs byung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:69b-28: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che rnam par shes pa rang gis byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:69b-30: 'on te rang gis kyang byas shing gzhan gyis kyang byas sam /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-0: 'on te rnam par shes pa rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis kyang @70a * //
T07TD4094.2E:70a-1: ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-2: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam par shes pa ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis kyang ma byas la /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-3: rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-4: rnam par shes pa rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis kyang ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin te /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-5: 'on kyang ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa byung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:70a-6: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che snga mas phyi ma dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-7: phyi mas snga ma 'di ji ltar rigs par 'gyur te /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-8: de ltar tshe dang ldan pa gsus po ches 'di skad du /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-9: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ming dang gzugs ni rang gis ma byas shing gzhan gyis ma byas la /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-10: rang gis byas pa dang gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-11: ming dang gzugs rang gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas par rgyu med pa las byung ba yang ma yin no //
T07TD4094.2E:70a-12: 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs byung ngo zhes bshad pa la /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-13: da ltar ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa byung ngo zhes tshe dang ldan pa gsus po ches bshad pa'i don mi shes te /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-14: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po ches bshad pa'i don 'di ji ltar blta bar bya /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-15: de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus skyes bu mkhas pa rnams ni dpes rnam par bshad pa'i don shes par 'gyur bas re zhig dpe nyon cig / dper na 'dam bu'i shog gnyis blang ba dag phan tshun bsten cing phan tshun 'brel ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-16: phan tshun bsten cing gnas te /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-17: de las 'ga' zhig gis gcig blangs nas gnyis pa lhung bar gyur pa de bzhin du /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-18: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ches gnyis po 'di dag ni phan tshun bsten pa phan tshun 'brel ba /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-19: phan tshun bsten cing gnas pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-20: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs yin zhing /
T07TD4094.2E:70a-21: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin no //
T07TD4094.2E:70a-22: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ji ltar ston pa'i kan thos mkhas pa gsal ba dul ba 'jigs pa med pa 'chi ba med pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-0: 'chi ba med pa'i khams lus kyis mngon sum byas shing bsgrubs te gnas pa dag gis 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin zab cing zab pa'i dris pa dag yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad nas lung bstan pa @70b legs so legs so //
T07TD4094.2E:70b-1: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che ni tshangs par spyod pa mkhas pa dag gis spyi bo la thod bzhin du thogs te /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-2: blta ba'i phyir 'gros rnyed pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-3: bsnyen bkur ba de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o //
T07TD4094.2E:70b-4: bdag cag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed de /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-5: bdag cag tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-6: bsnyen bkur rnyed pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che bdag cag sum cu pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa la bdag mngon par spro zhing bstod la rjes su yi rang ste /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-7: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dge slong na ba dang 'chi ba la yid 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-9: 'gog pa'i chos ston par byed na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:70b-19: rnam par shes pa la skyo ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-21: 'gog pa'i chos ston par byed na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:70b-22: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che na ba dang 'chi ba la yid 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-24: 'gag pa rtogs na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes bya'o bya ba nas /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-25: snga ma bzhin du rnam par shes pa la yid 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-26: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa dag rtogs par gyur na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:70b-27: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dge slong na ba dang 'chi ba la yid 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-28: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'gog pa dang nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes brjod par bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:70b-29: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che skye ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-37: rnam par shes pa la yid 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:70b-39: 'gog pa dang nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur na dge slong chos kyi gtam smra ba zhes brjod par bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:71a-0: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ston pa'i nyan thos @71a * //
T07TD4094.2E:71a-1: mkhas pa gsal ba dul ba 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba nas /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-2: snga ma bzhin du blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang bsnyen bkur rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-3: legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-4: skyes bu dam pa de gnyis phan tshun du mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs nas stan las langs te song ngo zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:71a-5: gang yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-6: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mdo de dang /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-8: gang yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan du rnam par shes pa 'gro ba dang 'ong ba bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-9: phung po'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'i mngon par mi byed ces bya ba'i mdo'i mtha' las 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-10: bdag med ces bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'i mdo gsum par sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i mdo gsum pa las byung ba mdzod kyi gnas drug pa 'di nyid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bsam par sa bon gyi rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dags so zhes bya ba der bshad zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:71a-11: zas bzhi gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-12: gleng gzhi yang dag par ldan pa'i sgo dang po las bu'i sha'i dpes bstan pa mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-13: 'gro ba zas kyi gnas pa yin //
T07TD4094.2E:71a-14: zhes bya bar zas kyi dbang du byas te /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-16: gal te kham du byed pa'i zas za ba'i lha rnams las 'das te zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-17: lung bar ma'i bdun pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa tha ma las 'char byed kyi mdo las 'don te /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-18: de'i mdo'i dum bu yang mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa'i /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-19: 'gog pa dang po mi nang du //
T07TD4094.2E:71a-21: gzhan du na 'char byed kyi mdo las 'gal lo zhes bya bar bris pa blta bar bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:71a-22: dga' ba'i zas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-23: ji ltar re zhig brgya byin gyis dris pa'i mdo las mdzod kyi gnas drug pa 'di nyid du /
T07TD4094.2E:71a-25: khams gzhan du ni 'gro mi byed //
T07TD4094.2E:71a-27: gzugs med pa rnams ni gzugs las nges par 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-0: @71b gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-1: nges par 'byung ba'i khams ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-2: 'dod pa rnams las nges par 'byung ba ni gzugs can rnams so //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-3: gzugs med pa rnams ni gzugs las nges par 'byung ba yin no //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-4: gang cung zad mngon par sems shing mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag 'gags pa ni nges par 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-5: gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag ces bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-6: lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'i phyi ma las ba lang skyong gi mdo las byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-7: ting nge 'dzin yang dag par ldan pa'i lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-8: rnam grangs rnam par bshad pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo dgu pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis pa 'di nyid du dbang po'i rna ba bshad par gzugs na drug go zhes bshad zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-9: gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can dag kyang yod ces bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-10: mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du rnam par shes pa'i gnas bdun dang /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-11: sems can gyi gnas dgu bstan pa'i mdo sems can lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa zhes bya ba nas /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-12: sems can gyi ni gnas dgur 'dod //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-13: ces bya bar bshad zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsam gtan dag la ni zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-15: nyan thos kyi rnam par bshad pa'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu pa las byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa 'di nyid du srid pa bar ma'i rnam pa yod pa nyid sgrub par byed pa bkod par mdo rgyas par bris zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-16: gal te de la yang 'di ltar 'du shes ni nad do //
T07TD4094.2E:71b-17: 'du shes ni 'bras so zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-18: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bos te /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-20: dge slong dag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal ba'o zhes rnam par shes pa 'dis shes par gyur na /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-21: 'di ni thams cad rig pa'i shes pa /
T07TD4094.2E:71b-22: 'di ni thams cad tshor ba'i shes pa'o zhes 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ste /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-0: dge slong dag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ni thams cad ma rig pa la thams cad @72a * //
T07TD4094.2E:72a-2: thams cad ma tshor ba la thams cad tshor ba'i nga rgyal can 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su ma bsal ba la 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal ba'i nga rgyal can te /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-3: dge slong dag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad du smra ste /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-7: 'du shes med pa ni kun du rmongs pa'o //
T07TD4094.2E:72a-8: 'di lta ste 'du shes med 'du shas med min skye mched ni zhib /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-9: 'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam bsgoms nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so //
T07TD4094.2E:72a-10: dge slong dag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba can /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-11: 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing yongs su ma grol ba /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-13: de gnas de nas 'chi 'phos nas 'di lta bu 'ong bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-14: skye gnas dman pa byi la'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur te /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-15: dge slong dag gang zhig 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal ba'o zhes rnam par shes pa 'dis yongs su shes par gyur na /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-16: 'di ni thams cad rig pa'i shes pa /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-17: 'di ni thams cad tshor ba'i shes pa'o zhes smra ba 'di ni yang dag par smra ba ste /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-18: ci'i phyir de'i yang dag par smras pas smra ba yin zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-19: 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal ba'o zhes rnam par shes pa 'dis shes par gyur na 'di ni thams cad rig pa'i shes pa 'di ni thams cad tshor ba'i shes pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-20: dge slong dag ji ltar thams cad rig pa yin zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-21: 'di ni dge slong rig pa'i skye mched drug rnams kyi kun 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-25: nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-26: 'di ltar na dge slong thams cad rig bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4094.2E:72a-27: dge slong ji ltar na dge slong thams cad tshor ba yin zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-28: 'di na dge slong tshor ba rnams kyi kun 'byung ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-32: nges par 'byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes te /
T07TD4094.2E:72a-33: 'di ltar na dge slong thams cad tshor bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-0: dge slong dag 'bras zhes bya ba 'di ni @72b lus gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhis bskyed cing pha dang ma'i mi gtsang ba las yang dag par byung ba zan dron dang 'bras chan gyis gsos shing /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-1: rtag tu khrus dang byug pa byas kyang 'jig cing gyes pa'i chos can gyi de'i tshig bla dags so //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-2: dge slong dag 'bras kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mig ni yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba'i gzugs la 'dzag cing /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-7: yid ni yid du 'ong ba dang mi 'ong ba'i chos la 'dzag pa'i phyir ro //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-8: 'bras kyi rtsa ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'i tshig bla dags so //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-9: gang gi phyir dge slong ma rig pa dang srid pa'i srid pa yongs su spangs shing yongs su shes par gyur pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-10: shing ta la mgo bcad pa ltar drungs phyung zhing mi snang zhing phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du byas pa 'di ni 'bras dang 'bras kyi rtsa ba yongs su bsal bar yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-11: gang sems gnas pa dang yang dag mar gnas pa zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-13: ji ltar re zhig lam gyi tshoms kyi lam gyi yan lag gi sgo'i log pa nyid ces bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'i mdo gsum pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas bzhi par /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-14: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-15: 'phel dang ma byas lam rdzogs phyir //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-17: spong ba dag ni chu lon du gsungs zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-18: 'o na mdo las bde ba'i dbang po gang zhe na zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-19: lam gyi tshoms gyi dbang po'i sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mtha'i cha las 'byung ba blta bar bya ste /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-20: 'di nyid kyi mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-21: lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-22: sdug bsngal dbang po zhes bya bar bshad zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:72b-23: bde ba lus kyis myong ba zhes bya ba la bsam gtan gyi rnam par byed pa de dang de las 'di ltar 'don te /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-24: de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral te /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-25: dran pa shes rab dang ldan zhing btang snyoms su gnas te /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-26: bde ba lus kyis myong ba gang 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan zhing btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:72b-27: dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:73a-1: 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-2: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar dbyar gnas pa'i phyir gshegs so //
T07TD4094.2E:73a-3: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song ste /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-4: nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
T07TD4094.2E:73a-5: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan par mdzad /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-8: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-9: chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis rnam grangs du mar yang dag par bstan /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-12: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung par bzhugs so //
T07TD4094.2E:73a-13: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T07TD4094.2E:73a-14: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu zla ba gsum du chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-18: 'tsho ba'i yo byad bzhes par gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cad mi gsung bar gnang bar mdzad do /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-20: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas nas song ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:73a-21: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos gos dang /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-26: 'tsho ba'i yod byad kyis nye bar gnas par byas te /
T07TD4094.2E:73a-27: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dbyar zla ba gsum 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go //
T07TD4094.2E:73b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T07TD4094.2E:73b-2: khyim bdag legs so legs so de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla ba gsum du chos gos dang /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-7: 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis nye bar gnas par byas kyi /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-8: khyim bdag ma 'ongs pa na mtho ris 'grub par byed pa skal pa khyad par can gyi rnam par smin pa bde ba can gong mar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4094.2E:73b-9: khyim bdag 'di tsam kyis dga' bar mi bya ste /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-10: 'on kyang dus dang dus su rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-11: gnas pa de ltar bslab par bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:73b-12: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo ;
T07TD4094.2E:73b-13: / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de na tshogs shing 'dug par gyur te /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song nas ring du lon par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T07TD4094.2E:73b-15: btsun pa ngo mtshar ro zhes bya ba nas 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las brtsams te /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-16: khyim bdag legs so legs so zhes bya ba nas /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-17: snga ma bzhin du de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-18: gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i bde ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i tshe chos lnga yongs su spong zhing chos lnga bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-19: chos lnga yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-20: gang yang 'dod pa nye bar sdud pa'i yid bde ba yongs su spong ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-21: gang 'dod pa nye bar sdud pa'i yid mi bde ba yongs su spong ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-22: gang yang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i yid bde ba yongs su spong ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-23: gang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i yid mi bde ba yongs su spong ba dang /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-24: gang mi dge ba nye bar sdud pa'i btang snyoms yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba ste /
T07TD4094.2E:73b-25: chos lnga po 'di dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-1: bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa gang zhe na /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-7: sh'a ri'i bu de de bzhin te /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-8: gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos rab tu dben pa'i dga' ba lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing bsgrubs te gnas zhes bya ba nas /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-9: snga ma bzhin du ting nge 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-10: mdo las kyang lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-11: lam gyi tshoms kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i mdo dang po las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gnyis par /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-12: dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-13: zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa dang /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-14: mdo las lus shin tu sbyangs pa zhes kyang 'byung ba ma yin nam zhes bya bar bris pa blta bar bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-15: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-16: skye mched drug gi tshogs kyis bsdus pa'i sdom dang po'i lam zhes bya ba'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'i tha ma las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas dang por /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-17: zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-18: zhes bya bar bris zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-20: lam gyi tshogs kyi dbang po'i sgo'i sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa las 'byung ba mdzod kyi gnas gsum par /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-21: nang gi skyon dang chos mtshungs phyir //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-23: 'dir sdug bsngal gyis dbang po 'gags so zhes bya bar bshad zin to //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-24: rnam par sgyur ba'i mdo las bsam gtan bzhi pa na bde ba'i dbang po 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T07TD4094.2E:74a-25: bde ba yang spangs te zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-26: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i dbang du byas nas mdo de dang de las 'don pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-27: de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin /
T07TD4094.2E:74a-28: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par btang snyoms yongs su dag par bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so zhes 'byung /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan gsum ni skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir g-yo ba dang bcas par gsungs zhes bya ba lung bar ma'i sdom gyi tshigs @74b su bcad pa gnyis pa'i dang po'i mdo las te /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-1: mdo dum bu mdzod kyi gnas gsum par /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-2: bzhi pa g-yo ba med pa yin //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-3: zhes bya bar bshad pa blta bar bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-4: mdo las rlung med pa'i mar me dper mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-6: dbyu gu gsum dang gong bu gsum //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-7: lu hi ta yi rnam bshad gnyis //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-8: zhes bya ba'i lu hi ta'i mdo dang po la rlung med pa'i mar me'i dpe 'di ltar 'don te /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-9: lu hi ta gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos bde ba yang spangs shing /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-10: sdug bsngal ba yang spangs te zhes bya ba nas /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-11: bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i tshe sems mtho bar mi 'gyur zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi g-yo ba thob ste /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-12: dper na khang pa'am khang pa'i khyams su mar me bzhag pa dud 'gro'am bya'am mis ma bskul zhing ma bskyod pa de srid du mi mtho mi dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi g-yo ba thob po //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-13: lu hi ta gang gi tshe 'phags pa nyan thos bsam gtan can bde ba yang spangs shing zhes bya ba nas bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa de'i sems kyang de'i tshe mtho bar mi 'gyur zhing dma' bar mi 'gyur bar mngon par gnas shing mi g-yo ba thob po zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-14: yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mdor bsdus te zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-15: gleng gzhi ni ma nyan du yod pa na'o //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-16: ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-17: rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-18: rtog pa med la dpyod pa cam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-19: rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-20: yang stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-21: gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na'o //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-22: ting nge 'dzin ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-23: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-24: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-25: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes gsungs so //
T07TD4094.2E:74b-26: lam yang gzings lta bur gdon mi za bar dor bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
T07TD4094.2E:74b-27: 'di lta ste chu bo gangg'a chus yongs su gang zhing rgyas te bya rog btung du rung ba tsam du gyur la gru 'am gzings med par rgyun phyogs dang bzlog phyogs dang pha rol dang tshu rol gyi 'gram du brgal bar mi nus pas /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-4: lo ma mang po dag bsdus te /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-6: gzings la brten cing gzings la gnas te lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol pas pha rol du 'gro bar bya'o zhes de de ltar rnam par dpyad nas rtsva dang /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-9: lo ma mang po dag bsdus te gzings byas nas /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-10: gzings la brten cing gzings la gnas te /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-11: rgyun las bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol tu phyin te /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-12: de nas skyes bu de 'di snyam du gzings 'di ni bdag la phan pa mang po byed pa ste /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-13: bdag gzings 'di la brten cing gzings la gnas nas rgyun las bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol tu brgal te /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-14: gang bdag gis gzings 'di ni mgo bo'am phrag pa la khur te gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar bya'o zhes /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-15: dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-16: skyes bu des phan pa mang po byed ba skyes bu de de lta de ltar rtog bzhin du gzings de mgo bo 'am phrag pa la khur te /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-19: de nas skyes bu de 'di snyam du gzings 'dis cung zad phan pa mang po byed pa yin te /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-20: bdag gzings 'di la brten cing gzings la gnas te rgyun las bzlog phyogs su lag pa gnyis kyis rtsol bas bde bar pha rol gyi ngos su brgal bar byas kyang bdag gis gzings 'di thang las bskyur ba 'am chu'i rgyun la bskyur bar bya'o zhes des gzings de thang la bskyur ba 'am chu'i rgyun du bskyur te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro na /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-21: dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems /
T07TD4094.2E:75a-22: skyes bu de gzings de la de lta de ltar rtog pa na bya ba byas pa yin nam /

T07TD4094.2E:76a-0: @76a * // ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa yongs su bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na shes par 'gyur ba dang mthong bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na /

T07TD4094.2E:76a-20: 'di ni gzugs kyi mi snang ba /
T07TD4094.2E:76a-25: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba /

T07TD4094.2E:76b-1: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun du bsten goms par byas lan mang du byas na zag pa zad bar 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
T07TD4094.2E:76b-2: ngas 'di la dgongs nas pha rol du 'gro ba dag gis dris pa la rnam par bshad do //
T07TD4094.2E:76b-4: gnyi ga rab tu spang bar bya //

T07TD4094.2E:76b-15: tshad med pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /

T07TD4094.2E:77a-0: @77a * // phyogs gcig tu mos shing khyab par byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so //

T07TD4094.2E:77a-8: rnam par thar pa ni rnam pa brgyad de /
